description: Try our easy to follow Saltimbocca Meatloaves With Creamy Polenta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Saltimbocca Meatloaves With Creamy Polenta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup sage and onion stuffing mix

recipeInstructions.text: Combine stuffing mix and 1/2 cup of hot water in a large heatproof bowl. Stir until all liquid is absorbed. Add mince and mix well to combine. Shape into eight equal patties and wrap each with a slice of prosciutto.
Heat 1 tbs of oil in a large non-stick frying pan on medium heat. Cook patties for 6 minutes on each side, or until completely cooked through.

Meanwhile, to make the polenta, pour milk and stock into a saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Gradually whisk in polenta. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring constantly, until thick. Remove from heat.
Remove patties from pan and keep warm. Add cranberry sauce to pan and cook for 1 minute, stirring, until melted. Stir in lemon juice and season.
Heat remaining oil in a pan over medium heat. Add tomatoes, kale and 2 tbs water. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or until softened.
Serve meatloaf patties on a bed of polenta and spoon over sauce. Accompany with vegetables.
